FuncDef: The display high-temperature power-off status command displays whether the function that checks power-off status at a high temperature is enabled.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the ID of the AP device.
The value is an integer ranging from 1024 to 8191.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check whether power-off at a high temperature is enabled, run the display high-temperature power-off status command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
The function that checks power-off status at a high temperature, if enabled, may cause boards to power off.
